revised_title: Silicon Compounds and Their Derivatives: Research on Thiocarbamide Reactions
tldr: The author investigates the reaction of silicon tetrabromide with various nitrogen compounds, discovering new thiocarbamide derivatives and the formation of tri- and tetra-thiocarbamide compounds. The study also introduces a new silico-organic compound, silicotetraplenyl, in direct and exclusive union with nitrogen amidic groups.
